Plot: As an actress starts to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world starts to become nightmarish and surreal.
Title: Inland Empire
Actors: Laura Dern, Jeremy Irons, Justin Theroux, Karolina Gruszka
tomatoConsensus: Typical David Lynch fare: fans of the director will find Inland Empire seductive and deep. All others will consider the heady surrealism impenetrable and pointless.
